race.name: Ancient Dwarf
race.speed:
20
Ancient The ancient races are as old as time itself, giving them all a unique viewpoint on the world and it’s happenings. An ancient has the following features. • Ancients gain a +1 bonus to any two ability scores, and a +2 bonus to any other ability score. • Ancients, having grown with the world and it’s animal life, have a +2 racial bonus on Handle Animal skill checks. In addition, they can use the speak with animals spell as an at-will spell-like ability. The caster’s level of the spell is equal to the user’s character level. • Ancients are immortal and do not suffer the effects of age. Because of their longevity, they have a +4 racial bonus on all Knowledge and Profession skill checks, and can make checks with those skills untrained. • Ancients were created by their gods using raw divine magic. They have spell resistance equal to 6 + their character level. • Ancients gain an additional skill rank at 1st level and one additional skill rank whenever they gain a level.
